subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry shot a two-under-par 70 for his second Champions Tour title, cruising to a five-shot victory at 14-under 196 in the ACE Group Classic in Naples, Fla.
snippet: Kenny Perry shot a two-under-par 70 for his second Champions Tour title, cruising to a five-shot victory at 14-under 196 in the ACE Group Classic in Naples, Fla.
